roleset.name: select only the best
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, pick-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: args 0, 1, PRD
example.text: Therefore , I do not believe we should be cherry - picking Islam as some specific evil , but rather opposing all religions for the extremely negative roles they play in the world .

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: The undrafted free agent rookie rushed for more than 1,000 yards in 2010 after the Bucs cherry picked him from Tennessee's cut list.
